company.name: Butter
company.product_type: Video conferencing and collaboration platform for facilitators, trainers, and meeting leaders
company.target_audience: Facilitators, trainers, workshop leaders, and meeting organizers who run interactive sessions
company.key_value_prop: Run engaging, interactive sessions with built-in facilitation tools like agendas, polls, breakout rooms, and timers — no extra plugins needed
company.aha_moment: Running your first interactive session with live polls and breakout rooms
company.pricing_model: Freemium with Pro plan (free tier includes basic sessions, Pro unlocks longer sessions, more participants, and advanced features)

voice.tone: Casual-professional: warm, encouraging, knowledgeable but never stuffy. Speaks like a friendly colleague who's great at running meetings.
voice.signature_style: First name with role, friendly sign-off (Cheers, Happy facilitating, Talk soon)
sample_phrases: Your sessions are about to level up
We built this because we've been there
Facilitating doesn't have to be stressful

recommendations: Focus activation sequence on agenda + polls + breakouts — these are the three features that drive the aha moment
Use in-app messages at point of use for feature discovery, email for scheduled nudges
Send weekly session recaps to reinforce value and build habit
Trigger team invite prompt after first successful session — social proof from peers drives retention
Trial-ending message should highlight features they haven't tried yet to create urgency
